name: Sheepest
description:
<Game Introduction> Save the Sheep in the Darkness!! This game is easy, Just save the sheep in the Darkness! but, Keep in this mind. That not everything we see is true...

--------------------------------------------------

<Controller>
  • WASD : Movement
  • Mouse : Viewpoint
  • ESC : Cursor ON/OFF

--------------------------------------------------

<Thanks>

This game is a participation work of Mini Jam 103: Darkness.

Thanks to the organizers.

Also, The game created with a lot of support.

They are described in CREDIT (in Build).

Thanks to them.
